name: Watchboxd
description: A web app for viewing film info, creating watchlists, and connecting with friends to share movie preferences.
longDescription: A multi-page web application where users can view film information, create watchlists and follow their friends to see their likes and watches.

videos.title: Watchboxd Project Walkthrough
videos.description: A short walkthrough going over Watchboxd with a demo of a functional React components.

features: Explore Films and Lists to find new Films!
Search for Films by Title, Genre, Director or Keywords!

name: Asante
description: A robust web app for task management, allowing users to create project boards with full CRUD functionality for sections and tasks.
longDescription: A complete task management web application where users can create project boards that utilizes full CRUD functionality towards a boardâ€™s sections and tasks.

name: Relive
description: A full-stack Express web app offering an Airbnb-inspired immersive experience.
longDescription: A full-stack web application built using Express which provides users with an immersive experience inspired by Airbnb.
